attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 40 years,more hit singles than any other british band, more appearances on Top of the Pops than any other band, second only to the Rolling Stones in albums made, opened the legendary Live Aid concert. Its about time Francis Rossi and Rick Parfitt were recognised for their outstanding contribution to British music. The band is a legend, still playing to sell out concert halls across the world. Its 40 years since their first single, surely it should be arise Sir Francis and Sir Rick? Many other artists with a fraction of these guys success have been recognised. Lets do the right thing and reward Britains greatest rock n roll band.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
